metadata.title: Prime minister condoles death of Nayyer BokhariÃ¢ÂÂs wife

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 3 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday expressed his deep grief over the demise of the wife of former Senate Chairman and Pakistan Peoples Partyas senior leader Nayyer Hussain Bokhari. The prime minister condoled with Nayyer Bokhari and prayed for peace for the departed soul and strength for the bereaved family to bear the loss, according to a PM Office press release.
content.summary: Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif expressed his grief over the death of the wife of Nayyer Hussain Bokhari. The Prime Minister offered condolences to Bokhari and his family.
